column5: Killeen Townhomes specializes in temporary housing offering month to month furnished homes with a minimum of 30 days.  Have more space with a fully stocked kitchen and all your appliances.  Make your stressful move a bit easier.   * All Utilities Included with WiFi and Cable  * All Appliances with Washer, Dryer,  * 2 pets of 40 lbs accepted ($200 one-time fee per pet+$30/monthly per pet pet rent)
